name: Indego
0:
”Alexa, tell Indego to cut the grass.”
”Alexa, ask Indego where it is.”
”Alexa, tell indego to go home.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indego
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mowing your lawn has never been so easy! You can now use Amazon Alexa to control your Indego Connect. Just ask Amazon Alexa to tell Indego to cut, pause or finish. If you are curious, you can also ask Indego where it is or for the cutting schedule.

To get started, all you have to do is ensure that you have already installed your Indego. Then simply create an Indego account and link to your Amazon Alexa account by clicking the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa app. 

Once you have successfully linked your accounts, you can start using the Indego skill.

You can tell Indego to mow the lawn simply by asking: 
"Alexa, tell Indego to cut"
"Alexa, ask Indego to mow"

You can ask Indego to return to the docking station, simply by asking:
"Alexa, ask Indego to go home"
"Alexa, ask Indego to return"

If you would like to ask for status, you can say things like:
"Alexa, ask Indego for status"
"Alexa, ask Indego for condition"

If you are interested in your cutting schedule, you could ask things like:
"Alexa, ask Indego for schedule"
"Alexa, ask Indego for calendar"

The "Indego" skill will work with all Indego Connect models. This includes: Indego 350/400 Connect, Indego 10C/13C and Indego 1000/1100/1200 Connect.
